name: Chu Kiang Chinese Restaurant 珠江精庄美食
address: 6491 Knight St, Vancouver, BC V5W 2J6, Canada

review.reviewBody: For any one who has grown up in Vancouver, this place serves 100% the ultimate comfort food. I grew up a poor kid in Vancouver in the 80's, and the few times my family could afford take out, it would be from places with flavors similar to Chu Kiang. Everything I've ordered from here has stirred up so many happy feelings. All the dishes this place serves brings nothing but joy to me. A true Vancouver hidden gem. This place is amazing! Definitely give these guys a try if you're looking for food to warm your belly and warm your soul
Nice little family run shop.  Good portions, always tasty!
I think I saw 2 pieces of pineapple in the Pineapple Sweet and Sour Boneless Pork 菠萝咕噜肉  It was kind of dry, with too much flour on the meat.
The food here is always delicious!
